channel.title: !npcs spawn! and ! and p ring!
channel.description:
:eek: ok on my server i wont to know how i can get npc to stand there so i can get them to shout out my name...
thank you,
and could you tell me how to put perfect ring form 0 on everthing to 10000 on everything
thank you,
mat...

item.title: !npcs spawn! and ! and p ring!
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

you can either just use Pimpscape or you would have to go into autospawn, make an NPC and then go into NPChandler.java and paste this in where your other npc’s say stuff:

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1644) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("1337scaper")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "1337scaper is online"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "1337scaper is offline"; } }[br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2007, 01:52:17 PM[/size][hr]There is also other tutorials that teach you how to do this…change “1337scaper” to ur name and change “1644” to whatever the ID of your NPC is.

Read full topic
